Title: Totsukuni no Shoujo
Description: [Let not an Outsider touch thee, Lest thou shalt be cursed forever., ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Once upon a time, in a land far away that was divided into two realms...', ' ', ' The Outside was roamed by teratomorphic creatures who had the power to curse whoever they touched. Humans could live safely only in the Inside. But when a lost little girl from the Inside named Shiva, and a demonic beast-looking Outsider simply known as "Teacher" initiate a quiet coexistence on the same side of the forest, their bond seems to transcend their incompatible natures. It is the beginning of a folktale about two outcasts -one human, one inhuman- who linger in the hazy twilight that separates night from day.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: Production I.G)']
